item.description:
Hi Everyone,
June is almost here. 90 degree weather is here. So lets go outside to Quincy Quarries on Sunday June 3rd. We will be top roping. Lets meet at 11am. If anyone needs a ride, email me and I can pick you up at Davis or Porter Sq at 10:15am. We should have ropes, but bring ropes and slings if you have them.

Disclaimer: YOU MUST WEAR A HELMET! If you are climbing with us (outside of the rock gym), it will be required for you to wear a helmet.

Also, there are no facilities. Bring water, food, sunscreen, etc.

We will leave the parking lot area at 11am sharp. If you come afterwards, you will just have to walk around and ask for the Rock Climbing Boston Meetup.

Directions:
The Quincy Quarries Reservation is part of the Blue Hills Reservation, south of Boston. Take Route 93/3 to exit 8 in Quincy. Follow signs for Quarry Hills Recreation Complex until you come to Ricciuti Drive, between a Mr. Tux and a large ?Quarry Hills? sign. It?s quick going south, but a bit roundabout going north. Turn right on Ricciuti Drive. There is a small parking lot on your right (which is usually full and you will most likely see a line of cars on the opposite side of road where you can park).
item.name: Climb Quincy Quarries
